Topic.Title: As a reminder, Ex-date is Monday, July 8th

Message.Msg: If you reinvest its better to wait till the ex date drop. You get about the same amount of shares but don't pay instant tax on the dividend.

Message.Msg: Must own on the day of RECORD to qualify and subsequently collect the dividend payout.

Topic.Title: how do i stop my union from taking dues out of my paycheck

Message.Msg: Saw an interesting article years ago comparing AT&T wages and benefits before there was a union and after. They were compared to companies like DuPont and Standard oil. After CWA moved in AT&T went down in comparable wages and benefits. This study was done in the 1950's and went back to the 1930's.

Topic.Title: What have we learned today from our MSM?

Message.Msg: Oh don't get me wrong, I think there should be a trail. I think you, Froggy and the media should just shut up until it is over. Where else and why else than Obama's unnecessary comments does this warrant the national attention it is getting. There is someone going around Ft. Worth and has killed two 74+ year olds in the last week, but you don't hear Fox, MSNBC and CNN talking about that. I think, as is typical, that the defense and the prosecution are greatly embellishing the past of both Martin and Zimmerman....but that is their job. Ours, unless we are on the jury is to shut up and allow the process to pay out. If you don't like the outcome, you're welcome to share you opinion even if no one wants to hear it.
